text: Gongguan is a metro station on the Songshan-Xindian Line in Taipei, Taiwan. The station code is G07. == Station layout information == The platforms are located underground. Platform 1 is for Songshan and Platform 2 is for Xindian. == Around the station == * Museum of Zoology * Taipei Water Park Category:Railway stations in Taipei
title: Gongguan metro station
